Uses of Class
hc.server.msb.Robot

  • Packages that use Robot 
    Package Description
    hc.server.msb  
    hc.server.ui  

    • Uses of Robot in hc.server.msb

      Methods in hc.server.msb that return Robot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Robot RobotEvent.getSource()
      return the event source wrapper of Robot.

    • Uses of Robot in hc.server.ui

      Methods in hc.server.ui that return Robot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Robot ProjectContext.getRobot(String name)
      get the wrapper of robot by name.

      Important :
      it is a wrapper of robot, not the instance created by your scripts.
      it means that your methods not extend from Robot will NOT be accessed from here.
      because robot may be driven by intelligent assistant, for example voice command.
